creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
description: five women outdoors, wearing traditional Japanese garments; two women at center seated on a bench; two women at left stand near a vertical rock, one in a blue kimono holding a parasol; another woman wearing a green apron stands with parasol at right
inscription:
Inscription

LRC, in the negative: [A 450. VIEW OF MINATOGAWA (RIVER) KOBE.]
title: View of Minatogawa (River) Kobe, from a photography album with images of Japan
